page.title: 07VILLAGE LIFE - SERVICES
page.content: In Goldhanger there is a post office but it is in a shop.There are no banks, police or firemen in Goldhanger and the nearest ones are in Maldon which is about 3-4 miles away.There is only one doctor in Goldhanger,who holds his surgery in a house at the top of Fish Street. The only transport in Goldhanger is the bus. It runs on a Thursday to market and on Saturday to market.There is a bus stop in Goldhanger square.In Goldhanger there are no trains or aircraft.If people in Goldhanger have no car,then travel is a problem. Goldhanger is a small place. The only employment in Goldhanger is to work on a farm or in the shop and post office or in the pub,the local garage or forge,otherwise people have to travel to Maldon,Chelmsford,Colchester or commute to further afield.
